alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fond du Lac, southeastern Green Lake, northeastern Columbia, northern Dodge and northwestern Sheboygan Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 900 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of North Fond Du Lac to near Brandon to near Cambria. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Beaver Dam, Waupun, Ripon, North Fond Du Lac, Lomira, Randolph, Markesan, Oakfield, Rosendale, Brandon, Cambria, Southern Lake Winnebago, Burnett, Taycheedah, Ashford, Lamartine, Byron, Fox Lake, and Eldorado. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 133 and 163, and between mile markers 165 and 169. Interstate 41 between mile markers 83 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Sheboygan
